title: Astounding Science Fiction v39n4
creator: Street and Smith Publications
description: Astounding Science Fiction , Volume 39 Number 4, June of 1947. Published by Street & Smith Publications, Inc., New York, NY. 164 pages. Cover art by Charles Schneeman. Edited by John W. Campbell, Jr. Featuring essays by John W. Campbell, Jr. as The Editor and John R. Pierce as J. J. Coupling. Includes the following works of fiction: Centaurus II, a Centaurus novelette by A. E. van Vogt. Letter to Ellen, a shortstory by Chan Davis. The Model Shop, a novelette by Raymond F. Jones. Errand Boy, a shortstory by William Tenn. Fury (Part 2 of 3, Keeps series 2), a serial by Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore as Lawrence O'Donnell.
